Create and store a network from correlation results in a MultiAssayExperiment

Source: R/run_create_network.R
run_create_network.Rd

Constructs an undirected network based on correlation results between exposures and features (e.g., DEGs, omics, latent factors, exposures) and optionally stores it in the metadata of a MultiAssayExperiment object.

Usage

run_create_network(
  expomicset,
  feature_type = c("degs", "omics", "factors", "exposures"),
  action = c("add", "get")
)

Arguments

expomicset

A MultiAssayExperiment object.

feature_type

One of "degs", "omics", "factors", or "exposures". Used to select correlation results.

action

"add" to store the graph in metadata, or "get" to return it.

Value

If action = "add", returns modified MultiAssayExperiment. Otherwise, returns a list with graph and summary.
